body.description: ForPro Large Hand Mirror is a single-sided hand-held mirror that features a long, comfortable grip handle. The large square face provides a clear reflection of hard-to-see places without distorting images. The hand mirror is designed for use by professionals and consumers. ForPro Professional Collection features the highest quality, best value, and largest selection for professionals and consumers. All products include 100% unconditional guarantee.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: ForPro Professional Collection represents the largest assortment of professional products for the spa, massage, manicure, and pedicure markets. Every product is made to the strict standards salon professionals have come to expect. ForPro is all developed and produced under the parent company of TNG Worldwide. The brand was launched in 1997. ForPro Professional Collection ForPro Large Hand Mirror ForPro Large Hand Mirror is a single-sided hand-held mirror that features a long, comfortable grip handle. The large square face provides a clear reflection of hard-to-see places without distorting images. The hand mirror is designed for use by professionals and consumers. ForPro Professional Collection features the highest quality, best value, and largest selection for professionals and consumers. Long, Comfortable Grip Handle Large Square Face Provides a Clear Reflection without Distortion Mirror is Encased in a Solid Black Frame Made from Thick Plastic Hanging Hole for Easy Hanging Lightweight - 9 Ounces 9" W x 12" L

Large Hand Mirror with Comfy Grip The classic black hand mirror features a rounded square shape with large viewing area and a long, comfortable hand grip. Crystal Clear, Distortion-Free Reflection The durable hand mirror uses high definition distortion-free reflective glass to provide an ultra-clear reflection. Lightweight Multi-Purpose Mirror The lightweight mirror is ideal for use in the bathroom, bedroom or salon and can be hung for easy storage or hands-free use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not the best quality ... But...
reviews.reviewText: You get what you pay for and it's EXACTLY what I expected and as advertised! 😊

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars ForPro Extra Large Hand Mirror - A Versatile and Exceptionally Crafted Beauty Tool
reviews.reviewText: The ForPro Extra Large Hand Mirror has proven to be an indispensable beauty tool, surpassing expectations in terms of size, quality, and versatility. This handheld mirror has become an essential part of my beauty routine, earning a well-deserved 5-star rating.Pros:Generous Size: The extra-large dimensions of this hand mirror (9” W x 12” L) provide an expansive and clear reflection, allowing for a comprehensive view of hairstyles, makeup, and skincare routines. The size sets it apart from standard mirrors, making it a standout choice for beauty enthusiasts.Sturdy Construction: The mirror's construction is notably sturdy and durable. The quality materials used ensure a long lifespan, with the mirror maintaining its clarity and integrity over time.Comfortable Handle: The inclusion of a handle adds a layer of convenience to the mirror's usage. The handle is comfortable to grip, allowing for a secure hold during extended use without causing hand fatigue.Multi-Purpose Design: This hand mirror proves to be versatile in its applications. Whether for styling hair, applying makeup, or assessing skincare routines, the mirror's design caters to various beauty needs.Crystal-Clear Reflection: The clarity of the reflection is exceptional. The mirror provides a true-to-life image, enabling precise and accurate beauty applications.Lightweight and Portable: Despite its generous size, the mirror remains lightweight and portable. It's easy to handle and can be conveniently carried for on-the-go beauty touch-ups or travel.Conclusion:The ForPro Extra Large Hand Mirror has become a standout addition to my beauty toolkit, elevating my beauty routine with its generous size, sturdy construction, comfortable handle, multi-purpose design, crystal-clear reflection, and portability. It has proven to be a reliable and essential companion for various beauty applications.For anyone seeking a high-quality and generously sized hand mirror that excels in both design and functionality, the ForPro Extra Large Hand Mirror is an excellent choice. I wholeheartedly recommend it, and its 5-star rating reflects my complete satisfaction with this exceptional beauty tool.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice large mirror.
reviews.reviewText: Great purchase. The mirror is nice and large. Received quickly and a great price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Large and easy to use
reviews.reviewText: I like the size of this mirror because it is easier to see the back of my hair. The small one I had just was insufficient. The mirror is lightweight and has a handle on it so you could hang it on the wall. The reflection is clear with no distortion that I see. I am very happy with this purchase. Great deal.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy, works well and comfortable
reviews.reviewText: I'm happy with this item - it is sturdy, have a good quality, and has a big mirror like I looked for and a bit hard to find.Would definitely buy again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Item arrived cracked and the glass was dirty, not sure if it was broken in transit or was a previous return. The box looked fine. Ended up going locally to get one to avoid this again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Large, plastic, hand mirror. Good value.
reviews.reviewText: A good price for a very useful product. It’s a oversize plastic hand mirror that comes in very handy you could pay more, but if you just need the practicality of a hand mirror, this will serve its purpose great

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars nice size, quality magnification
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for a large hand mirror for occasional use. this one fit the bill- Light weight and good quality- so far so good.
This is a very big mirror. It is great for checking out your beard or hair.
Tamaño adecuado para mis necesidades, ligero y delgado, amplitud para ver toda la cabeza, manipulable para ver la parte de atrás del peinado. Lo recomiendo.
Product came super fast and it is high quality as expected, at a great price.

Buen tamaño, el material es frágil pero realmente cumple su función. Me gusto mucho. Se me cayo levemente y no se rompió el espejo solo el plástico se zafó, desde luego no es a tomar en cuenta pues fue error mío.
The joint between the mirror and the handle is not very sturdy. Can see it breaking off fairly easily. But I mean its a mirror, and it reflects stuff so 10/10 on that.
